subject: Appraisal of the Projects - Modifications in the Constitution of (i) Project Appraisal and Technical Scrutiny Committees (PATSC) and (ii) Internal Appraisal Committees (IAC) - reg.
text: 9ay 75y TTHRf gifeazrut (7e35 9faavt Jir RrTHPf TART4, "Ia TIYFTr) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Fzi4a Ta 6f1-5 Q 6, N47-10, ENA, 7 @crl} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TTMI /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Appraisal of Projects/ 2025 Policy Circular No. 3.6.18/2025 dated 21st April, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. PPPDIV-12016/5/2024-0/0 Member (PPP) (Comp. No. 254213)} Sub: Appraisal of the Projects Modifications in the Constitution of (i) Project Appraisal and Technical Scrutiny Committees (PATSC) and (ii) Internal Appraisal Committees (IAC) reg: The Committees (PATSC and IAC) mentioned in Policy Circular No.3.6.17/2024 dated 27.09.2024 have been reconstituted as under: Constitution of Committee Jurisdiction Project Appraisal and Technical Scrutiny Committees (PATSC) Committee-1 The Projects in the States of 1 _ Sh: Alok Deepankar, Member (Technical) Chairman Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, 2 .
